casebody.data:
GATLING OHIO, L.L.C.
v.
ALLEGHENY ENERGY SUPPLY CO., L.L.C. 2018-1524 Supreme Court of Ohio. November 29, 2018

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULING

On motions for admission pro hac vice of Andrew L. Noble and Russell J. Ober Jr. Motions granted. Pursuant to Gov.Bar R. XII(4), counsel shall file notice of permission with the Supreme Court's Office of Attorney Services within 30 days.
